metadata.productGoal: Enable merchants to efficiently manage their product catalogs at scale

backlog.title: Bulk Product Operations
backlog.description: Enable merchants to perform operations on multiple products simultaneously to save time and improve efficiency
backlog.productOwnerNotes: Critical for Q1 launch - top merchant request

backlog.title: Bulk product tagging
backlog.description: As a merchant, I want to apply tags to multiple products at once, so that I can organize my catalog efficiently without manual tagging
acceptanceCriteria: Given I have selected 50 products, when I apply a tag, then all 50 products are tagged within 5 seconds
Given a tag is applied, when I view the products, then the tag is visible on all selected products
Given I apply a tag to 100+ products, when the operation completes, then I receive a success confirmation with the count
Given an error occurs during tagging, when the operation fails, then I see a clear error message and can retry
backlog.productOwnerNotes: First story to implement from bulk operations epic

backlog.title: Bulk price updates
backlog.description: As a merchant, I want to update prices for multiple products simultaneously, so that I can quickly adjust pricing during sales or promotions
acceptanceCriteria: Given I have selected products, when I apply a percentage discount, then all prices are updated correctly
Given I apply a fixed amount change, when the update completes, then all prices reflect the change
Given I update prices, when the operation completes, then I see a preview before confirming
Given invalid price data, when I attempt to update, then I receive validation errors
backlog.productOwnerNotes: Second priority from bulk operations epic

backlog.title: Product sync fails for large inventories
backlog.description: When merchants have >1000 products, the initial sync operation times out and fails to complete
acceptanceCriteria: Given a merchant has 1000+ products, when initial sync runs, then it completes successfully
Given sync is in progress, when it's taking >30 seconds, then I see a progress indicator
Given sync encounters rate limits, when it backs off, then it retries with exponential backoff
backlog.productOwnerNotes: Affecting 15% of merchants with large catalogs

backlog.title: Research GraphQL batch operations for Shopify API
backlog.description: Investigate optimal patterns for batch operations using Shopify Admin GraphQL API to improve bulk operation performance
acceptanceCriteria: Performance comparison of batch vs individual operations
Code examples or proof of concept
backlog.productOwnerNotes: Time-boxed to 4 hours, needed before implementing bulk operations at scale

priority.description: Lower number = higher priority (1 is highest)
